structure.unit: B LICENSURE AND REGULATION OF HEALTH FACILITIES AND SERVICES

text.section: The principal office of the commission shall be located at the state capital, and it shall be kept open during the usual business hours.
The commission shall hold meetings at its principal office and at such other convenient places in the Commonwealth as are expedient or necessary for the proper performance of its duties.

law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 210, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1988. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 135, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1980.
